info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:08PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bannock...northeastern Power and southwestern Bingham Counties through 1245 PM MDT... At 1208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Fort Hall Bannock Creek Lodge or 11 miles south of Pocatello, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, eastern American Falls Reservoir, Chubbuck, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge, Fort Hall Townsite, Springfield, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, Pocatello Airport and Mink Creek Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
